title: Even for Some Mamdani Supporters, His Thin Résumé Is Cause for Concern
summary: Many voters struggle with a fundamental question about Zohran Mamdani’s candidacy: Is a 34-year-old state assemblyman ready to lead the nation’s largest city?

title: Trump Administration Live Updates: Energy Secretary Says Nuclear Tests Won’t Involve Explosions
Trump’s Retribution Campaign Leaves D.C. U.S. Attorney’s Office in Crisis
summary: Few places have felt the effects as palpably as the U.S. attorney’s office in Washington, which is deeply enmeshed in the workings of government and has filed criminal cases against President Trump.

title: F.D.A. Drug Unit Chief Resigns, Citing a ‘Toxic’ Environment
summary: The official, Dr. George F. Tidmarsh, became embroiled in an ethical dispute over his public criticisms of a drug and a new program to rapidly approve medications.

title: Food Stamp Cuts Expose Trump’s Strategy to Use Shutdown to Advance Agenda
summary: The president has stretched the limits of his powers to help those at the heart of his agenda, not the many in greatest need.

title: Indiana Republican Tries Different Approach in Debate on Voting Maps: Listening
summary: As redistricting efforts spread across the country, an Indiana state senator said he isn’t sure how he will vote on a plan that President Trump supports.

title: The NYC Marathon in Photos and Videos
summary: Some 55,000 people came out to race through the five boroughs on a sunny Sunday.

title: Kipruto Wins NYC Marathon Men’s Race in One of the Closest Ever Finishes
summary: Some past New York marathons have been extremely tight. Benson Kipruto’s split-second victory was a photo finish.

title: 2025 New York City Marathon: Best Fashion Looks
summary: Held on a Halloween weekend, this year’s race had a mother-and-daughter duo dressed as cows, a human-size banana and Ken (without Barbie).

title: She Was Ready to Have Her 15th Child. Then Came the Felony Charges.
summary: MaryBeth Lewis’s desire to be a new mom again, at 65 years old, led to a custody battle like no other.

title: Maria Riva, Dietrich Daughter Who Demystified the Legend, Dies at 100
summary: She was her mother’s handmaiden and aide-de-camp. In 1993, her blockbuster biography told of the awful price she paid.

title: This Is the Way You Beat Trump — and Trumpism
summary: Democrats do not just need to win more people. They also need to win more places.

title: Women Need Workplace Boundaries — Not Remote Work or Flexibility
summary: Discussion of women in the workplace often focuses on flexible hours, but what’s actually needed is shift work — pioneered by the medical profession.

title: Defense Lawyers Demand Dismissal of Abuse Case Against Israeli Soldiers
summary: The chief legal officer of Israel’s military resigned after authorizing the leak of a video in the case involving grave abuse of a Palestinian detainee. That further politicized a fraught case.

title: 5 Die, Including 3 Children, in Halloween Night House Fire
summary: The cousin of a state assemblyman, his wife and children died in the fire in Paterson, N.J. Seven other relatives survived the blaze.

title: That Time Xi Jinping Joked About Espionage
summary: Xi Jinping gave two cellphones to South Korea’s president, who asked how secure they were. “You can check if there’s a backdoor,” he said with a laugh.
